translations: n.傻瓜，笨蛋；屁股，臀部；<旧>驴；性感的人

phrs.translation: [美国俚语]处境恶劣；破产；穷困潦倒；毫无希望

sentences.sentence: I jumped back and fell on my ass.
sentences.translation: 我往后一跳，摔了个屁股墩。

sentences.sentence: What a CONCEITED and heedless ass!
sentences.translation: 多么自负和粗心的蠢驴！

sentences.sentence: I'm a stupid ass, I am!
